item.description: This meditation group meets weekly on Sundays 5-6 p.m. (donation only) and is good for beginners as well as experienced meditators. Being guided will help you relax and let go. It's a nice community of people in a lovely setting in a healing space. Kriya meditation is based on the teachings of Yogananda.  It is a guided meditation meant to bring about a felt sense of divine love into your body, heart and mind.  Some time is also spent in silence. This practice is non-denominational, appropriate for anyone.  See more at [url=http://www.ahigherbalance.com]www.ahigherbalance.com[/url]
item.how_to_find_us: Enter at The Hawthorne Building, the door between Saucy Insurance and H&R Block.

group.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group

item.name: The Salem MA Meditation Meetup Group Weekly Meetup
